comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: This appears to have been a joke. While it is true that European armies trained much larger, stronger dogs in teams, to pull gun carriages on the battlefield -- and these were indeed called "War Dogs" -- Erhardt's gentle dachshund was not one of them. Little Fritzi's "gun carriage" rolls on toy wheels, and the menacing gun barrel appears to be a cardboard tube -- perhaps Herr Erhardt's kaleidoscope?
